category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMCN_release_revision_mode
preference.preference_description: Controls how statuses are created on ItemRevisions being tracked by a Change Notice Revision. The "preferred" ReleaseStatus will be one of statuses in preference "MEMCN_release_statuses" that is found on the ChangeNoticeRevision. Valid values are (case sensitive): * Share: The ItemRevisions share the "preferred" status with the ChangeNoticeRevision. * None: The ItemRevisions will not get a status. * ShareEffectivityOnly: The ItemRevisions will each have a new ReleaseStatus, all of which will share Effectivity with the Change Notice Revision "preferred" ReleaseStatus. * Clone: The ItemRevisions will get new ReleaseStatuses and Effectivities that are clones of the "preferred" ReleaseStatus. The default value is Share.
